name: Rishabh Software
tagline: Rishabh - Digital Transformation Partner for SMBs
description:
Rishabh Software is a customer-centric Digital solutions provider with a focus on Digital Services, Analytics, Cloud Computing, Application Modernization, Big Data, and Data Science. We are a growing team of 500+ with skills in Microsoft Stack, Open Source, Mobility, Frontend Development, Machine Learning, Dev Ops, Data Science, System Integration, Product Engineering, and Automation.
Since 1999, we have successfully delivered over 1000+ successful projects to our customers across 23 countries, including the USA, UK, Europe, Canada, Australia, and more. We are a CMMi 3, ISO 9001:2015, 27001 Certified Company headquartered in India with offices in USA and UK.
Our capabilities: 
Application modernization, Product Engineering, Application Integration, Analytics, Mobile Apps, Web Development, FrontEnd Engineering
Our expertise:
Microsoft Technologies: .Net, MVC, SharePoint, Azure, Dynamics 365, BizTalk Server, PowerBIPHP: Laravel, Zend, WordPress, Magento, Drupal, Joomla, CakePHP, CodeIgnitor, NodeJSJava: Spring, Hibernate, RabbitMQ, MongoDB, Kafka, PostgreSQL, EJB, Apache Spark,Mobile: iOS, Android, Ionic, Xamarin, PhoneGap
Front End: AngularJS, ExpressJS, KendoUI, VueJS, ReactJS
Testing: JIRA, Appium, June, TestComplete, DeviceAnywhere, Robotium & Selenium
Check our flexible Engagement Models & Global Delivery Models – Offshore, Onshore & Hybrid. 
Get Free Consultation for your project Call us now 24x7 or fill the form or sales@rishabhsoft.com
READ MORE...
